message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.HC, cs.MM

This paper deals with the annotation and retrieval of images using semantic and emotion content descriptions, which is a topic that falls under several sub-categories of computer science. 

Firstly, cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is a likely sub-category as the paper discusses retrieval methods for image databases. 

Secondly, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is also a possible sub-category as the paper uses WordNet as a tagging glossary and discusses the importance of human and machine-processable information in knowledge representation. 

Thirdly, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is a possible sub-category as the paper deals with image annotation and retrieval. 

Fourthly, cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) is a possible sub-category as the paper discusses the usefulness of image repositories in this field. 

Finally, cs.MM (Multimedia) is a possible sub-category as the paper discusses plans to improve the WNtags tool to create a collaborative Web-based multimedia repository for research in human emotion and attention.
